BU OYUNDA EMEĞİ GEÇENLERİN ELLERİ DERT GÖRMESİN

It is full of cheaters in the free version and also in the prime version.
I've played the free version and thought it would get playable with the prime version (which is an upgrade to the free version which costs 14+ euros) but it did not. Still tons of cheaters in the prime version. I do NOT recommend this game.

My biggest problem with this is, I couldn't refund PRIME because I already had 2+ hours into CSGO but I didnt have that much time played on PRIME. I also couldn't reach out any real support to help me with this issue. It feels like a huge scam.

CSGO may seem like a great game because of the amazing esport and viewer-perspective but it's completely shit anti-cheat makes it not fun to play at all.

I advise against buying this game/the prime version.
